title: Melanated Mic Night
description: Twitter posts from Melanated Mic Night

items.title: We take care of our own, and we collect our own. We do not harbor abusers, be they physical or emotional, and we do not harbor manipulators. ‚ÄúFuck around and find out‚Äù applies to those who think they can get away with such behavior in our networks, too, to be clear.
items.content_html: We take care of our own, and we collect our own. We do not harbor abusers, be they physical or emotional, and we do not harbor manipulators. ‚ÄúFuck around and find out‚Äù applies to those who think they can get away with such behavior in our networks, too, to be clear.

items.title: A Black man was trying to support an unhoused neighbor in a wheel chair and @DenverPolice knocked his glasses off, ripped his shirt off and two officers kneeled on his back. pic.twitter.com/AEvVeVxf7c
items.content_html: A Black man was trying to support an unhoused neighbor in a wheel chair and @DenverPolice knocked his glasses off, ripped his shirt off and two officers kneeled on his back. pic.twitter.com/AEvVeVxf7c

items.title: Wow. Just wow. What a powerful night full of empowering speeches. Thank you to all of our Black relatives who spoke tonight. Thank you to @TayAndersonCO and @CandiCdeBacaD9 for spitting facts and truths. Back to organizing we go‚Äî this is only the beginning. #melanatedmicnight pic.twitter.com/tY9SebWLCa

items.title: Tonight I was again reminded of the burden and work Black women carry in this movement. There are so many who are not heard in the community.
items.content_html: Tonight I was again reminded of the burden and work Black women carry in this movement. There are so many who are not heard in the community.

items.title:
White people: HoW dO wE kNoW hOw To HeLp?

Also white people: not showing up for actions with BIPOC speakers.

items.title: Extremists are planing to disrupt today‚Äôs non-violent action for Black lives. ‚Äî We will rely on allies to help keep impacted folks centered on tonight‚Äôs message.

items.title: If you‚Äôre showing up to #melanatedmicnight  & are a non-Black melanated human, we hope that you will understand that tonight‚Äôs mic night will be dedicated to our Black relatives‚Äî please help us uplift & amplify their voices tonight by taking the backseat with our white allies.

items.title: Let‚Äôs not forget about Trayford Pellerin  ‚Äî a 31 year old Black man who was murdered by the police in Lafayette, LA. He was shot 11 times on the evening of August 21, 2020. @TayAndersonCO can we include him in tonight‚Äôs prayers as well? #DenverProtest #denverprotests

items.title: Being a police officer is the only occupation where you can shoot someone and get PAID TIME OFF. #BlackLivesMatter

items.title: Update!! Jacob Blake is still alive and fighting for his life rn.

items.title: In observance of @TayAndersonCO event tonight at Manual HS for Jacob Blake, we have decided to move #melanatedmicnight to Fuller Park at 7:30 pm. Please join us at 6:30 pm at Manual HS in solidarity and prayer for the murder of Jacob Blake. #denverprotests #denverprotest pic.twitter.com/cvKeXK7zLk

items.title: A black person shouldn‚Äôt have to be perfect or extraordinary or a college grad or a parent in order to explain why they deserved to not be shot by a police officer. This is a simple concept.

items.title: Missionaries have been one of the most effective instruments of colonisation. They have been used as a tool to control & subjugate indigenous people. By imposing their religion & the superiority of their god, they set in motion the domination & exploitation we still see today.
items.content_html: Missionaries have been one of the most effective instruments of colonisation. They have been used as a tool to control & subjugate indigenous people. By imposing their religion & the superiority of their god, they set in motion the domination & exploitation we still see today.
